issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Consolidate Source and Dataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7886](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7886). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Source and Dataset are very similar concepts (collections of multiple data fragments). Consolidating them would decrease doc burden without reducing our flexibility.
